answers.author: Bryan Layton
answers.text:
The City of San Antonio provides quarterly financial reports, and our current year reports can be found here: http://www.sanantonio.gov/Budget/BudgetFY2013-Adopted.aspx

The City of Fort Lauderdale provides monthly financial reports - http://www.fortlauderdale.gov/documents/financial_reports/index.htm

answers.author: Robert Woods
answers.text:
Albany, Oregon provides 24/7/365 access to general ledger accounts for all departments/programs updated daily, since 2008.
http://dashboard.cityofalbany.net/Dashboard/Pages/Report.aspx?ItemPath=/Albany_Dashboard

author: Natalie Wyman
text: Do other localities publish quarterly financial reports? If so, are they online – please provide a link.  We are particularly interested in seeing the format of the reports, type of analysis provided, detail of budget v. actuals, etc.
title: Publishing Quarterly Financial Reports Online
